about.title: hic et nunc
paragraphs: The present decentralized application allows its users to manage decentralized digital assets, serving as a public smart contract infrastructure on Tezos Blockchain.
IPFS NFTs can be minted and traded by permissionless means. such experiment was designed intending to imagine alternative crypto economies.
We're concerned about your security and autonomy. please verify informations while making transactions.
For consulting, networking or questions get in touch by %EMAIL%, %DISCORD%, or on %REDDIT%.
If you're having trouble with the website, please report an %ISSUE%

swap.warning: swaps which carry value are charged with a 2.5% fee for platform maintenance

cancel.title: you're about to cancel your swap

burn.title: Burning your NFT will permanently delete it from the network
